name: MEC Goto Fleece Mitts - Unisex
description:
Slip these light stretchy mitts under your alpine handwear when it’s super cold. Or wear them alone when you need a light layer of protection when hiking or winter running.Thumbs and ends of mittens have touchscreen friendly overlays.Main fabric is warm mid-weight polyester-spandex fleece.Clips keep them together when you're not wearing them.

        Sustainability
